title: Abed Nego buy Shares of PT Archi Indonesia Tbk
body: Abed Nego purchased 25,200,000 shares of PT Archi Indonesia Tbk on 8 Dec 2025 at IDR 750 per share, investing IDR 18,900,000,000. His holding rose from zero to 25,200,000 shares, establishing a direct stake in the listed company. The transaction is classified as an investment, expanding the shareholder base and potentially influencing future corporate governance.

title: Infiniti Wahana buy Shares of Steady Safe Tbk
body: Infiniti Wahana purchased a total of 570,000 Steady Safe Tbk shares on 10 Dec 2025 at an indicative price of IDR 272 per share. The holding rose from 459,890,813 to 460,460,813, reflecting a +570,000 share increase. The transaction, classified as a purchase, marginally expands Infiniti Wahana’s stake in the company.

title: Junichiro Waide sell Shares of PT Venteny Fortuna International Tbk
body: Junichiro Waide sold a total of 8,100,000 VTNY.JK shares between 3 Dec and 10 Dec 2025 at roughly IDR 94 per share as part of a portfolio adjustment. His holding decreased from 1,306,116,974 shares to 1,298,016,974 shares, a reduction of about 0.62% of his stake in PT Venteny Fortuna International Tbk.

title: Rudy Suhendra buy Shares of PT Archi Indonesia Tbk
body: On 8 Dec 2025, shareholder Rudy Suhendra purchased 27,000,000 shares of PT Archi Indonesia Tbk at IDR 750 per share for investment purposes. His holding increased from 0 to 27,000,000 shares, a delta of +27,000,000 shares, establishing a new equity position in the company.

title: Kenneth Ronald Kennedy Crichton buy Shares of PT Archi Indonesia Tbk
body: On 9 Dec 2025, investor Kenneth Ronald Kennedy Crichton purchased 5,000,000 shares of PT Archi Indonesia Tbk at IDR 750 per share, increasing his holding from 0 to 5,000,000 shares (a delta of +5,000,000). The transaction, classified as a buy for investment purposes, gives Crichton a direct ownership stake in the listed company, potentially influencing shareholder composition and signaling confidence in the firm’s prospects.

title: Rizki Indrakusuma Buy Shares of PT Archi Indonesia Tbk
body: On 8 Dec 2025, Rizki Indrakusuma purchased 25,200,000 shares of PT Archi Indonesia Tbk at IDR 750 per share, investing IDR 18,900,000,000. His holding rose from 0 to 25,200,000 shares, establishing a new equity position. The transaction is classified as an investment and represents a significant entry of capital into the company.

title: Null sell Shares of Bayan Resources Tbk
body: On 8 Dec 2025, the shareholder identified as Null sold 1,010,000 Bayan Resources Tbk shares at IDR 8,000 per share as a divestment. The holding decreased from 13,407,650,470 shares to 13,406,640,470, a reduction of 1,010,000 shares. The transaction reflects a modest ownership change without broader strategic implications.

title: Robin Sunyoto buys Shares of PT Hero Global Investment Tbk
body: Robin Sunyoto purchased 25,000 shares of PT Hero Global Investment Tbk at IDR 152 per share on 2 Dec 2025, increasing his holding from 13,275,000 to 13,300,000 shares (a +0.19% rise). The transaction is classified as an investment, reflecting a modest expansion of his stake in the listed company.

title: Harimas Tunggal Perkasa sell Shares of PT Impack Pratama Industri Tbk
body: Harimas Tunggal Perkasa sold a total of 825,000,000 shares of PT Impack Pratama Industri Tbk at a representative price of IDR 2,500 per share, reducing its holding from 22,020,395,000 to 21,195,395,000 shares. The transaction, disclosed on 12 Dec 2025, is classified as a sell and is driven by investment realization and the aim to increase the company's free float. The divestment lowers Harimas's ownership proportion and contributes to greater market liquidity for IMPC.JK.

title: Raymond buys Shares of PT Chandra Asri Pacific Tbk
body: Raymond purchased 100,000 shares of PT Chandra Asri Pacific Tbk at IDR 7,500 per share, increasing his holding from 3,000,000 to 3,100,000 shares. The transaction, recorded on 5 Dec 2025, reflects a 3.33% stake increase and is classified as an investment purpose.

title: Hidayat Dwiputro Sulaksono buy Shares of PT Archi Indonesia Tbk
body: On 8 Dec 2025, shareholder Hidayat Dwiputro Sulaksono purchased 25,200,000 PT Archi Indonesia Tbk shares at IDR 750 per share, costing IDR 18,900,000,000. His holding rose from 771,900 to 25,971,900 shares, a net increase of 25,200,000 shares. The transaction is recorded as an investment and significantly boosts his ownership stake in the listed construction firm.

title: PT Mandiri Herindo Adiperkasa Tbk Shareholder Yenny Hamidah Koean Reports New Transaction
body: On 9 Dec 2025, shareholder Yenny Hamidah Koean invested in PT Mandiri Herindo Adiperkasa Tbk, acquiring 163,439,100 shares at IDR 160 per share. Her holding rose from 1,334,733,600 to 1,498,172,700 shares, increasing her stake by 12.3%. The transaction is recorded as an investment and reflects a notable ownership increase in the company.

title: Hillcon Equity Management sell Shares of PT Hillcon Tbk
body: Hillcon Equity Management sold 15,000,000 PT Hillcon Tbk shares at IDR 160 per share on 10 Dec 2025 as an investment‑related transaction. The shareholder's holding decreased from 6,537,713,000 to 6,522,713,000 shares, a reduction of 15,000,000 shares, but it remains a major stakeholder in the company.

title: Gema Lintas Benua sell Shares of PT Ketrosden Triasmitra Tbk
body: Gema Lintas Benua sold 4,000,000 shares of PT Ketrosden Triasmitra Tbk (KETR.JK) at IDR 1,205 per share to meet cash requirements. The shareholder's stake decreased from 755,240,483 to 751,240,483 shares, a reduction of 4,000,000 shares. The transaction reflects a modest dilution of ownership without immediate impact on company control.

title: Christian Emanuel David Sompie buy Shares of PT Archi Indonesia Tbk
body: On 9 Dec 2025, shareholder Christian Emanuel David Sompie purchased 20,000,000 shares of PT Archi Indonesia Tbk (ARCI.JK) at IDR 750 per share for investment purposes. The holding rose from 0 to 20,000,000 shares, establishing Sompie as a new equity holder and increasing the company's free float.

title: Infiniti Wahana buy Shares of Steady Safe Tbk
body: Infiniti Wahana purchased an additional 120,000 shares of Steady Safe Tbk, raising its holding from 459,570,813 to 459,690,813 shares. The transaction was executed on 4 Dec 2025 at an approximate price of IDR 287 per share. The purpose is classified as a purchase, modestly increasing the shareholder’s stake in the company.

title: Samuel Tumbuh Bersama Buy Shares of PT Nusantara Sawit Sejahtera Tbk
body: On 12 Dec 2025, shareholder Samuel Tumbuh Bersama purchased 525,000,000 shares of PT Nusantara Sawit Sejahtera Tbk at IDR 500 per share, costing IDR 262,500,000,000. The holding increased from 8,794,995,300 to 9,319,995,300 shares, a rise of 525,000,000 shares. The transaction reflects a direct purchase to expand the shareholder's stake in the palm oil producer.

title: Infiniti Wahana buy Shares of Steady Safe Tbk
body: Infiniti Wahana purchased an additional 200,000 shares of Steady Safe Tbk on 9 Dec 2025, at a representative price of IDR 260 per share. The holding rose from 459,690,813 to 459,890,813 shares, a modest increase in its stake. The transaction is classified as a purchase and reflects the shareholder's continued investment in the company.

title: Gema Lintas Benua sell Shares of PT Ketrosden Triasmitra Tbk
body: Gema Lintas Benua sold 100,000 shares of PT Ketrosden Triasmitra Tbk (KETR.JK) to meet cash requirements. The transaction, executed on 8 Dec 2025 at an indicative price of IDR 840 per share, reduced its holding from 765,240,483 to 765,140,483 shares, a decrease of 0.01%. The sale represents a modest dilution of the shareholder’s stake and may signal short‑term liquidity needs.

title: Andri Hutama Putra sell Shares of PT ITSEC Asia Tbk.
body: Andri Hutama Putra sold 120,000 PT ITSEC Asia Tbk. (CYBR.JK) shares at an indicative price of IDR 1,370 per share. His holding decreased from 20,232,100 to 20,112,100 shares, a reduction of 120,000 shares. The transaction is classified under Other Investments and reflects a modest divestment by the shareholder.

title: Buana Graha Utama buys Shares of Multi Indocitra Tbk
body: Buana Graha Utama purchased a total of 100,200 shares of Multi Indocitra Tbk for investment purposes. The buys were executed on 3 Dec 2025 (200 shares) and 10 Dec 2025 (100,000 shares) at IDR 600 per share. Holdings rose from 286,717,018 to 286,817,218, a net increase of 100,200 shares, indicating a modest stake expansion.
